abilities.name: Crystal Type
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a Fire, Water, or Lightning basic Energy card from your hand to Ho-oh, Ho-oh's type (color) becomes the same as that type of energy until the end of the turn.

attacks.name: Scalding Steam
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy card attached to Ho-oh and flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.
